original_text: as numerous as the flocks for offerings at Jerusalem during her appointed festivals. So will the ruined cities be filled with flocks of people. Then they will know that I am the Lord.”
korean_text: 제사 드릴 양 떼 곧 예루살렘이 정한 절기의 양 무리 같이 황폐한 성읍을 사람의 떼로 채우리라 그리한즉 그들이 나를 여호와인 줄 알리라 하셨느니라

sentences.original_text: as numerous as the flocks for offerings
at Jerusalem during her appointed festivals
So will the ruined cities be filled
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 폐허가 된 도시들이 가득하게 될 것이라
